body:
@ClockworkGod I'm glad that I'm not the only one who made note of this fact.

It's like @BadArchitect stated, this story needed editing. More specifically, this story's author needed an editor to keep him in line because it was obvious by the fifth chapter that he had no set plan for this story; introducing superfluous characters, forgetting key plot points like the fact that Hoshihiko is supposedly number one on Angel society's hit-list, completely glossing over the conflicts between Hoshihiko and the remaining angels sent to kill him, retroactively making Anapiel the mother of Hoshihiko and implying she cared about his well-being despite her being the one who ordered his assassination, and that bullshit, Deus Ex climactic "battle" at the end. I legit started to become increasingly annoyed the more I read after pg. 152.
This needs editing on soooo many levels smh
Well Mc Is Back On His Body ....
Lol Mc Sister Is A Slut...
Well this shit has everything Vanilla ntr milf dark harem impregnation... and a story like daym this is some shit
